item.title: Andrew add a quote by Jerry Seinfeld
item.description: "Dogs are the leaders of the planet. If you see two life forms, one of them's making a poop, the other one's carrying it for him, who would you assume is in charge." -- Jerry Seinfeld

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Robert Louis Stevenson
item.description: "I travel not to go anywhere, but to go. I travel for travel's sake. The great affair is to move." -- Robert Louis Stevenson

item.title: Andrew add a quote by J.D. Salinger
item.description: "That's the thing about girls. Every time they do something pretty, even if they're not much to look at, or even if they're sort of stupid, you fall in love with them, and then you never know where the hell you are. Girls. Jesus Christ. They can drive you crazy. They really can." -- J.D. Salinger

item.title: Andrew add a quote by James Truslow Adams
item.description: "There are obviously two educations. One should teach us how to make a living and the other how to live. Surely these should never be confused in the mind of any man who has the slightest inkling of what culture is. For most of us it is essential that we should make a living...In the complications of modern life and with our increased accumulation of knowledge, it doubtless helps greatly to compress some years of experience into far fewer years by studying for a particular trade or profession in an institution; but that fact should not blind us to anotherâ€”namely, that in so doing we are learning a trade or a profession, but are not getting a liberal education as human beings." -- James Truslow Adams

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Khaled Hosseini
item.description: "There is a way to be good again..." -- Khaled Hosseini

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Andrew add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "The problem with socialism is that you eventually run out of other people's money." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Andrew add a quote by e.e. cummings
item.description: "Humanity I love you because when you're hard up you pawn your intelligence to buy a drink." -- e.e. cummings
